body_html:
@drpngx Should we use something like that

http://163.172.41.53:8080/#activation=tanh&batchSize=10&dataset=circle&regDataset=reg-maximum&learningRate=0.0001&regularizationRate=0&noise=0&networkShape=3,2&seed=0.29413&showTestData=false&discretize=false&percTrainData=50&x=true&y=true&xTimesY=false&xSquared=false&ySquared=false&cosX=false&sinX=false&cosY=false&sinY=false&collectStats=false&problem=regression&initZero=false&hideText=false

to implement the maximum function in order the gradient to work (with static values rather than variables) ?
Width seems not to be necessary this way.
